name: Learning Unity Challenge Week 3-4: 2D Platformer
description:
My name is Daniel and I am challenging myself to learn game Development.

To do this I am giving myself a weekly task of making a small game with the intention to explore Game Development concepts, and progressively challenge myself more and more.

This is my third game in the series. I had a little bit more time to make this game due to exploring new ideas and concepts.

Please consider giving it a play and providing feedback!
